Title: The Ricklantis Mixup
Writer: Dan Guterman, Ryan Ridley, Jane Becker (executive story editor), Sarah Carbiener (story editor), Erica Rosbe (story editor), Tanner Tananbaum (staff writer)
Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer, Sarah Chalke
Plot: Whilst Rick and Morty go off to adventure in Atlantis we take a look at how the Citadel has rebuilt itself since both Rick and Morty visited.
